snippet.title: Grove Grown Guardians: Developer Game Demonstration
snippet.description:
This is an unedited video demonstration of the mechanics of Grove Grown Guardians. Some game elements are explained in this video, but when playing, the ? icons provide more details than what is discussed here.


Grove Grown Guardians is a strategy game about growing plants and defending the grove from the threat of corruption. Periodically, creatures tainted by the corruption will attack the grove and the guardians will need to face them in auto-battling combat. In order for the grove to survive, resources and plants must be managed to provide guardians with the advantage they will need to win.


To see more:
Visit the Steam page 
  https://store.steampowered.com/app/3037550/Grove_Grown_Guardians/
Watch the Mechanics Trailer:
  https://youtu.be/paFwpzQL3iI
